name: Chess 2 (itch) (ReasonStudios)
description:
Have you ever played chess and thought: "wow, this game really needs an update"? Well this is for you! Welcome, to *Chess 2*. The update to the classic game of chess we've all been waiting for. Okay, I can't think of anything else to write so just play it. (This game was made as a joke so please don't take it seriously. It's really bad.)

Video this is based off of, by Oats Jenkins:
